short_summary: Providing new mobile vehicle lift to Transport Canada
description: Canada is seeking offers to provide Transport Canada with the new mobile vehicle lift.  Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid process, to be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 calendar days of receipt of bid results.  Reference the solicitation for further details.
full_summary:
**Vehicle Hoist Tender**
=======================
**Reference Number**: WS4463392153
** Solicitation Number**: WS4463392153
**Tender Announcement Date**: March 22, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: April 8, 2024, 2:00 PM local time

**Project Overview**
-------------------
The Government of Canada is inviting offers to provide a new mobile vehicle lift for Transport Canada.

**Project Details**
-----------------
* Location: Wabush, NL
* Deliverables:
	+ A new mobile vehicle lift
	+ Installation and (optional) maintenance of the lift
	+ Testing and commissioning of the lift

**Advertisement**
----------------
Vendors may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Opening Declaration**
----------------------

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

A Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) has been published on the Ariba Discovery portal. interested parties can access the tender documents on the portal by clicking on the following link:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19160647?extsite=MTkxNjA2NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Vendor Contact Information**
-----------------------------

For any questions or to request tender documents not available online, please contact the Contracting Authority:

- Name: Shawn Trahan (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Guidelines**
---------------------

* The procurement will be conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The Procurement Method is Competitive and Open Bidding.
* Selection criteria will be based on the lowest price from qualified bidders.
* Terms and Conditions apply.
